attributes.action: Stop Post Office staff making small business owners feel ashamed when they visit
attributes.background: Small business owners rely on Royal Mail and the Post Office to send out orders to customers. Increasingly, they are made to feel embarrassed, ashamed and/or guilty for taking their parcels to the Post Office, especially when they've bought the postage online and not paid directly at the counter.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
